title: Report Power Outage
description: A customer calls to report that their power is out.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account using their phone number or address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's service location.

tasks.description: Check the outage management system (OMS) to see if the customer is part of a known outage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is within the boundary of a known outage.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with the estimated time of restoration (ETR) and offer to sign them up for text message updates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the ETR and successfully enrolls the customer in outage alerts.
